ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely there are guardians over you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: you do so the while there are watchers over you;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but you should know that there are angelic guards
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed there are some guardians over you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But verily, over you to watch you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely there are keepers over you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: yet there are over you watchers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! there are above you guardians,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, there are guardians watching over you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verify there are for you guardians,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, there are over you watchers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But verily over you (are appointed angels) to protect you,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But verily, over you (are appointed angels in charge of mankind) to watch you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet over you there are watchers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:10] Yet lo! there are above you watchers, from among the angels, over your deeds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! there are above you guardians) among the angels who guard and preserve your works,
